doc.title: Ruby

value.content:
Ruby is an open-source programming language. In a Web context, Ruby is often used server-side with the Ruby On Rails (ROR) framework to produce websites/apps.

Ruby is also a method for annotating east Asian text in HTML documents to provide pronunciation information; see the <ruby> element.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Ruby on Wikipedia
  • Ruby's official web site
  • Ruby On Rails' official web site
